page.title: 12THE STRONG'S FARM
page.content: The Strong's Farm is at Richs Holford. At the Strong's Farm they have beef cattle and some sheep and they grow oats,wheat and barley. We saw the sheep dip. The disinfectant in the sheep dip will burn you if you touch it. Mr Strong let us go in his combine harvester. To go inside the combine you need to go up some steps . Inside the cabin you can see a lot of things. We also went on top of the combine it felt a little shakey.The combine has cutters that cut wheat. The wheat comes out of a funnel. Also on the combine there are things that look like cutters but they pick up the straw left from the wheat instead. They have big tanks for keeping wheat they are 6 metres tall. The different kinds of tractor are Fiat,Ford, Massey Furgeson,and Zetor.
